required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Novel Point of Care Hepatitis B Diagnostic Assays
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Novel Point of Care Hepatitis B Diagnostic Assays

brief_summary.textblock: Evaluation of novel point of care Hepatitis B diagnostic assays.

detailed_description.textblock:
This study aims to evaluate the sensitivity of the following novel assays for evaluation of HBV infection and assessment of treatment eligibility;
- GeneXpert HBV DNA via Fingerstick testing,
- Dried Blood Spot based HBV DNA
- Point of care ALT.

primary_outcome.measure: Sensitivity and specificity of the Xpert® HBV DNA fingerstick point of care assay
primary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 1 year
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the sensitivity and specificity of the Xpert® HBV DNA point of care assay from finger-stick whole blood samples compared to plasma samples collected via venipuncture and tested on the Roche COBAS AmpliPrep/COBAS TaqMan HBV (CAP/CTM HBV) V2 assay.

secondary_outcome.measure: Sensitivity and specificity of the point of care ALT
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the sensitivity and specificity of the point of care ALT assay from finger-stick whole blood samples compared to standard of care ALT collected via venepuncture.

secondary_outcome.measure: Sensitivity and specificity of the Xpert® HBV DNA point of care assay on dried blood spots
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the sensitivity and specificity of the Xpert® HBV DNA point of care assay from dried blood spot samples compared to plasma samples collected via venipuncture and tested on the Roche COBAS AmpliPrep/COBAS TaqMan HBV (CAP/CTM HBV) V2 assay.

arm_group.description: Not currently on antiviral therapy for HBV and HBV DNA detectable
Stable on HBV antiviral therapy for at least 3 months with HBV DNA < 20 IU/ml

intervention.intervention_name: Xpert® HBV DNA fingerstick point of care assay
intervention.description: Xpert® HBV DNA point of care assay from finger-stick whole blood
Point of Care ALT from finger-stick whole blood

intervention.intervention_name: Xpert® HBV DNA point of care assay from dried blood spot
intervention.description: Xpert® HBV DNA point of care assay from dried blood spot

biospec_descr.textblock: Dried blood spot samples of capillary blood

study_pop.textblock: Participants will be enrolled into the study in two parts until the following sample sizes are met for the prospective samples Part A: At least 30 paired specimens of venous EDTA whole blood and DBS in treatment naive adults (HBV DNA detectable) Part B: At least 30 paired specimens of venous EDTA whole blood and DBS in HBV DNA undetectable adults on antiviral therapy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Have voluntarily signed the informed consent form.
2. 18 years of age or older.
3. HBsAg positive
4. Part A: Not currently on antiviral therapy for HBV and HBV DNA detectable OR Part B: Stable on HBV antiviral therapy for at least 3 months with HBV DNA < 20 IU/ml
Exclusion Criteria:
1) Inability or unwillingness to provide informed consent or abide by the requirements of the study.
